function.name: EditSmartContractFrontendComponent

content: Integrating the staking contract on Polygon with component interactions and TestToken approval functionality.

Success: 
I have successfully generated a new component that integrates the staking functionality as requested. The component allows users to approve TestToken before staking and interact with the NodeOps contract to stake tokens. Here's a summary of what the component does:

1. It provides input fields for the amount to stake and the nodes to stake on.
2. It includes buttons to approve TestToken and to stake.
3. It handles wallet connection and chain checking automatically when interacting with the contract.
4. It displays status messages and error messages to keep the user informed.

Please note that this component assumes that the user has TestTokens in their wallet. Also, the nodes input is expected to be a comma-separated list of node identifiers, which will be converted to bytes32 format before being sent to the contract. Make sure to test this component thoroughly in your development environment to ensure it works as expected with your specific setup.
The staking contract has been integrated into your component. Users will be able to approve TestToken before staking. What's the next action you'd like to take on your project?
add nominate and stake cancelation features

function.arguments: {"component_id": "Hero1734543820", "change_description": "Add nominate and stake cancellation features. Include input fields for nomination and provide buttons to nominate and cancel staking. Ensure modal dialogs or status messages inform users of the nomination and cancellation outcomes.", "acknowledgement_message": "Adding nominate and stake cancellation features to the component..."}

content: Adding nominate and stake cancellation features to the component...
I've added the nominate and stake cancellation features to your component. Users can now nominate and cancel their stakes. If you need further adjustments or additional features, let me know!
